BE PART OF THE AIS FAMILY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.4em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

LEAD WITH US, LEARN WITH US, SERVE WITH US

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#B21822″ text_font_size=”32px” text_line_height=”1.2em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR IN OUR STAFF

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

AIS is perpetually on the lookout for individuals who embody a commitment to ethical growth, prioritize lifelong learning, center their focus on students, demonstrate adaptability, work diligently, and possess a keen interest in leveraging technology to push the boundaries of their abilities.
